It's such a struggle being away from mexican food when it's so accessible in California. However, Rosa Negra does an excellent job of filling in that gap. Mojitos for €3.50 and shrimp burritos were so good. My friend got the chicken mole and the chocolate sauce it came with was surprisingly so good with the dish. I love how the place is decorated and being seated on the second floor gives you a nice view of the entire restaurant.
